title: Hero and Daughter+
notes: If I switch workspaces while fullscreen or click outside of the game while fullscreen the game may crash(9/10 times, but there *was* that one time it didn't crash). I'm on i3 though and haven't tested on a normal stacking wm. Computer info pulled from inxi -b
specs: Quad core Intel Core i5-7500 (-MCP-) speed/max: 3612/3401 MHz, Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.25.0, 4.17.0-8.1-liquorix-amd64, LLVM 8.0.0)
